Title: TFS Workflow Control
Description: TFS Workflow Control is a workflow custom control for Work Items
HomeWiki:
Project Description
TFS Workflow Control is a work item custom control for Team Explorer and Team System Web Access 2008 and 2010 . It shows the previous states of the current work item.

Team Explorer control:


Web control:


Project History
  • Aug 14, 2010: Workflow 1.0 for TFS 2010 (client and web)
  • Feb 24, 2010: Updated version for TFS 2010
  • Jan 6, 2010: First version of the web control
  • Sept 21st, 2009: Client Control 1.0 for TFS 2008

The workflow is the same as in Fissum application (http://fissum.codeplex.com

How to use the workflow control?
The workflow control must be installed on each computer from where the work item will be edited. Use the process template editor on a computer where the workflow in installed to add a new element in the layout of the work item types:
